img_above_text:
## Black Myth: Wukong Jade Moon Rabbit Location
The Jade Moon Rabbit Curios item is dropped by Zhu Bajie upon defeating him in The Webbed Hollow.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the player battling Zhu Bajie, a key enemy in the game. Zhu Bajie is the boss in The Webbed Hollow, and defeating him rewards the player with the Jade Moon Rabbit Curios item. The image emphasizes the intense gameplay and Zhu Bajie's dialogue, "If there's no joy for me, then there's no joy for anyone!" which adds narrative depth to the encounter. This visual complements the preceding guide on finding the Jade Moon Rabbit and ties into broader tips for locating items and gear in the game.
